content: note the final st of the last sl3 will include one from the k2 from the beginning of this round round 12 *k3 insert needle under the strands from the previous rounds and knit the next st making sure to pull through all three loops repeat from * around repeat row 1-12 five more times 72 rounds tttiiimmmeee tttooo dddeeecccrrreeeaaassseee if you like you can either begin using the magic loop method or switch to us size 8 dpns or size needed to obtain gauge for this section round 1 *k2tog k6 repeat from * around 84 sts round 2 *sl2 purlwise wyif k1 sl3 purlwise wyif k1 repeat from * around 84 sts round 3 *k2tog k5 repeat from * around 72 sts round 4 *sl1 purlwise wyif k1 sl3 purlwise wyif k1 repeat from * around 72 sts round 5 k2 s1k2p *k3 s1k2p repeat from * around end k1 48 sts round 6 *insert needle under both strands from the previous rounds and knit the next st k1 repeat from * around 48 sts round 7 k2tog around 24 sts fffiiinnniiissshhhiiinnnggg oooffffff cut yarn and thread a yarn needle with the end run the yarn end through each of the stitches left and pull tightly closed like a drawstring tie off to secure and weave in all ends cccooonnngggrrraaatttuuulllaaatttiiiooonnnsss yyyooouuu hhhaaavvveee mmmaaadddeee yyyooouuurrr vvveeerrryyy ooowwwnnn ssstttooorrryyyttteeelllllleeerrr hhhaaattt i hope you enjoyed this knitting pattern and tutorial be sure to sign up for our newsletter so you don t miss the next one also i d love to see your work tag me on instagram using @thechesapeakeneedle #thechesapeakeneedle and #storytellerhat so that i can find you easily i just might share your photos on my page it would be amazing if you could share the love and tell a friend about my work or follow me on pinterest i couldn t do what i do without your support
